item.title: tidy-forecasting BitCoin prices
item.description: library(tidyverse) library(forecast) Cryptocurrencies are becoming an interest of mine, since Iâ€™ve got friends who talk about them all the time. So I thought it might be interesting to have a look at a time series of BitCoin, and use the opportunity to do some tidyverse-style time series analysis, in the spirit of this great post. The data are availbale from http://www.coindesk.com/price/. Click on Select All > Export to download the data.
